pages.text: The first step towards force fields is finding the base resources.$(br)MFFS components are mainly made out of $(5)Steel Ingots$(), which can be crafted in 2 simple steps. First, make yourself some $(5)Steel Compound$() in crafting, which you can then smelt into ingots.
Combine an Iron Ingot with 4 Coal to create a Steel Compound.
Smelting the Steel Compound into a Steel Ingot.
One of the most common ingredients you'll be using in MFFS. It is used to craft base components such as the $(5)Focus Matrix$() or the $(2)Blank Card$(), as well as force field machinery.
